summary: Customer pays $5k/month | Term 1 year | Provider may change features

clauses.text: Either party may terminate for convenience with thirty (30) days’ written notice.
Customer shall pay $3,000 per month. Fees are fixed for the initial term and any renewal terms.
Provider guarantees 99.9% uptime measured monthly. Service credits apply for downtime exceeding the SLA.
Each party’s liability is capped at two (2) times the fees paid in the twelve (12) months preceding the claim, excluding breaches of confidentiality and IP infringement.
Each party shall indemnify the other against third-party claims arising from breach of this Agreement.

risks.Either party may terminate for convenien: Either party may terminate for convenience with thirty (30) days’ written notice.
risks.Fees are fixed for the initial: Fees are fixed for the initial term and any renewal terms.
risks.Service credits apply for downtime excee: Service credits apply for downtime exceeding the SLA.
risks.Each party’s liability is capped at: Each party’s liability is capped at two (2) times the fees paid in the twelve (12) months preceding the claim, excluding breaches of confidentiality and IP infringement.
risks.Any changes to this Agreement must: Any changes to this Agreement must be mutually agreed in writing.
